entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
